meanings.meaning_en_US: To speak softly and indistinctly.

examples.sentence: He tends to [mumble] his words when he's nervous.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在緊張時常常咕噥著說話。

examples.sentence: I could barely hear her [mumble] over the noise.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我幾乎聽不到她的咕噥聲。

examples.sentence: Please don't [mumble]; speak clearly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請不要咕噥，說得清楚點。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To cause someone to feel sudden shock or surprise.

examples.sentence: The loud noise will [startle] her when she least expects it.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當她最不期待的時候，響亮的噪音會使她震驚

examples.sentence: I didn’t mean to [startle] you when I walked in.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我進來的時候不是故意要嚇到你

examples.sentence: The sudden movement [startled] the bird.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 突如其來的動作嚇到了那隻鳥

meanings.meaning_en_US: To surprise someone very much.

examples.sentence: The magician will [astonish] the audience with his tricks.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 魔術師將用他的把戲使觀眾驚訝。

examples.sentence: Her talent never failed to [astonish] me.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的才華總是令我驚訝。

examples.sentence: It [astonished] him to see his old friend after so many years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 多年後再見到老朋友讓他感到驚訝。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To attract the strong attention and interest of someone.

examples.sentence: The magician's tricks [fascinate] the audience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 魔術師的把戲吸引了觀眾的注意。

examples.sentence: Her stories always seem to [fascinate] the children.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的故事總是能吸引孩子們。

examples.sentence: They are [fascinated] by the wonders of the universe.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們對宇宙的奇觀感到著迷。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To cause someone to feel extreme fear.

examples.sentence: The sudden loud noise [terrified] the children.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 突然的巨大聲音使孩子們感到恐懼。

examples.sentence: She was [terrified] to walk alone at night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在晚上獨自走路感到非常害怕。

examples.sentence: The horror movie [terrified] the audience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 恐怖電影使觀眾感到恐懼。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Happy and carefree; also refers to a sexual orientation.

examples.sentence: The children were [gay] as they played in the sun.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們在陽光下玩得很快樂。

examples.sentence: She wore a [gay] dress to celebrate the festival.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她穿了一件快樂的裙子來慶祝這個節日。

examples.sentence: He came out as [gay] last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他去年公開了自己的性取向。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A collection of historical records and documents.

examples.sentence: The [archive] contains documents from the 18th century.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個檔案包含18世紀的文件。

examples.sentence: We need to organize the [archive] for easier access.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要整理檔案以便於更容易訪問。

examples.sentence: Historians often refer to the [archive] for their research.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 歷史學家經常查閱檔案進行研究。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To spoil or damage something.

examples.sentence: The spilled paint will [mar] the surface of the table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 濺出的油漆將損壞桌子的表面。

examples.sentence: She fears that her mistakes will [mar] her reputation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她擔心她的錯誤會損壞她的名聲。

examples.sentence: The scrapes [mar] the otherwise perfect finish.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些刮痕破壞了原本完美的表面。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Not clothed; bare.

examples.sentence: The statue depicted a [nude] figure.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 雕像描繪了一個裸體的身影。

examples.sentence: She prefers to paint [nude] portraits.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她更喜歡畫裸體肖像。

examples.sentence: The artist celebrated the beauty of the [nude] form.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 藝術家讚美裸體形體的美。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To arrange to receive something regularly, typically a publication or service.

examples.sentence: I decided to [subscribe] to the monthly magazine.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我決定訂閱這本月刊雜誌。

examples.sentence: You can [subscribe] to various channels online.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以在線上訂閱各種頻道。

examples.sentence: Many people [subscribe] for updates on their interests.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多人訂閱更新以獲知他們感興趣的內容。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A woman who is sexually attracted to other women.

examples.sentence: She identifies as a [lesbian] and is an activist for LGBTQ+ rights.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她認同自己是一名女性同性戀者，並且是LGBTQ+權益的活動家。

examples.sentence: There are many support groups for [lesbian] women.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 有許多支持女性同性戀者的團體。

examples.sentence: The film features a [lesbian] couple as the main characters.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部電影以一對女性同性戀者作為主要角色。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A symbol or design adopted by an organization to identify its products.

examples.sentence: The new [logo] represents our brand's commitment to sustainability.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個新標誌代表了我們品牌對可持續性的承諾。

examples.sentence: They redesigned their company [logo] for a modern look.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們為了現代感重新設計了公司的標誌。

examples.sentence: Every product has the company [logo] on it.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個產品上都有公司的標誌。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The process or activity of accurately ascertaining one's position and planning and following a route.

examples.sentence: Modern technology has improved [navigation] significantly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 現代科技已顯著改善導航。

examples.sentence: He studied terrestrial [navigation] for his degree.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他學習了地面導航以獲得學位。

examples.sentence: Mariners rely on celestial [navigation] at sea.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 海員依賴天文導航在海上航行。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Failure to fulfill an obligation, especially a financial one.

examples.sentence: The company was in danger of [default].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該公司面臨違約的危險

examples.sentence: To avoid [default], they had to restructure the debt.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 為了避免違約，他們不得不重組債務

examples.sentence: He faced penalties for his [default] on the loan.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 由於他未能履行貸款，他面臨懲罰

meanings.meaning_en_US: Belonging or relating separately to each of two or more people or things.

examples.sentence: The students returned to their [respective] homes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 學生們回到了各自的家。

examples.sentence: They discussed their [respective] projects.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們討論了各自的計畫。

examples.sentence: The teams should focus on their [respective] goals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 各隊應專注於各自的目標。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A system of beliefs, practices, and values that relate humanity to spirituality and moral values.

examples.sentence: She practices her [religion] every Sunday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她每個星期天都在信奉她的宗教。

examples.sentence: Different cultures have distinct forms of [religion].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不同文化有各自獨特的宗教形式。

examples.sentence: His view on [religion] was profoundly influenced by his upbringing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的宗教觀深受家庭背景的影響。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A book with a flexible paper cover.

examples.sentence: I prefer reading a [paperback] because it's lightweight.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡讀平裝書，因為它輕便。

examples.sentence: He bought a new [paperback] from the bookstore.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在書店買了一本新的平裝書。

examples.sentence: She collects different editions of [paperback] novels.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她收集不同版本的平裝小說。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To officially attach or connect to an organization.

examples.sentence: We decided to [affiliate] with a larger network.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們決定與更大的網絡附屬。

examples.sentence: The company will [affiliate] with a non-profit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該公司將與一家非營利機構附屬。

examples.sentence: Many clubs [affiliate] under one umbrella organization.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多俱樂部在一個總體組織下附屬。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Including all or nearly all elements or aspects of something.

examples.sentence: The report provided a [comprehensive] overview of the research.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這份報告提供了研究的綜合概述。

examples.sentence: They conducted a [comprehensive] analysis of the data.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們對數據進行了綜合分析。

examples.sentence: Her [comprehensive] understanding of the subject impressed everyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對這個主題的綜合理解讓大家印象深刻。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The sale of goods in large quantities at lower prices, typically for resale by retailers.

examples.sentence: They decided to [wholesale] their products to cut costs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定批發產品以降低成本。

examples.sentence: Many stores buy [wholesale] to maximize profits.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多商店以批發方式進貨以增加利潤。

examples.sentence: The company [wholesales] various electronics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該公司批發各類電子產品。
